languages.text: {n}Движения Маражая стремительны и едва уловимы взглядом. Одним прыжком преодолев разделяющее вас расстояние, он валит вас на пол, придавливает к полу и поднимает раскаленный клинок...{/n}
{n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Движения Маражая стремительны и едва уловимы взглядом. Одним прыжком преодолев разделяющее вас расстояние, он валит вас на пол, придавливает к полу и поднимает раскаленный клинок...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

{n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}
{n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的动作极其敏捷，你几乎无法看清他的动作。他一下子就把你推倒在地，将你死死地按在地上，举起了炽红的利刃……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的动作极其敏捷，你几乎无法看清他的动作。他一下子就把你推倒在地，将你死死地按在地上，举起了炽红的利刃……{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの動きは素早くて、ほとんど認識できない―あっという間に床に押し倒されて体は固定され、真っ赤に焼けた刃をこちらに振り上げた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの動きは素早くて、ほとんど認識できない―あっという間に床に押し倒されて体は固定され、真っ赤に焼けた刃をこちらに振り上げた…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai es tan rápido que apenas percibes su movimiento; te derriba saltando sobre ti, te sujeta contra el suelo y levanta el puñal, que arde al rojo vivo...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai es tan rápido que apenas percibes su movimiento; te derriba saltando sobre ti, te sujeta contra el suelo y levanta el puñal, que arde al rojo vivo...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai est si vif que vous avez à peine le temps de le voir réagir. D'un seul bond, il vous plaque au sol et brandit sa lame chauffée à blanc...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai est si vif que vous avez à peine le temps de le voir réagir. D'un seul bond, il vous plaque au sol et brandit sa lame chauffée à blanc...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ist mit seiner Bewegung so rasend schnell, dass du sie fast nicht wahrnimmst – mit einem Satz drückt er dich zu Boden, hält dich dort fest und setzt mit der glühend heißen Klinge an ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ist mit seiner Bewegung so rasend schnell, dass du sie fast nicht wahrnimmst – mit einem Satz drückt er dich zu Boden, hält dich dort fest und setzt mit der glühend heißen Klinge an ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, öylesine süratli hareket ediyor ki güç bela fark ediyorsun. Tek bir hamleyle seni zemine yatırıp zapt ediyor ve akkor hâldeki bıçağını kaldırıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is so swift you barely register his movement — in a single bound, he forces you to the floor, pins you down, and raises the red-hot blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, öylesine süratli hareket ediyor ki onu güç bela fark ediyorsun. Tek bir hamleyle seni zemine yatırıp zaptediyor ve akkor hâldeki bıçağını kaldırıyor...{/n}
